translated: Constanze Mozart, whose real name is Constance Weber, born January 5, 1762 in Wiesental (Germany) and died March 6, 1842 in Salzburg was the wife of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.
original: Constance Mozart, de son vrai nom Constance Weber, née le 5 janvier 1762 à Wiesental (Allemagne) et morte le 6 mars 1842 à Salzbourg était la femme de Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.
